extension.summary: Add missing artwork to the library for the selected item.
extension.description: Adds all missing artwork configured in Artwork Beef for the selected item. This item is added to the 'Manage...' sub-menu. It also supports Artwork Downloader with a setting.

extension.summary: Show Artwork Beef GUI for the selected item.
extension.description: Shows the Artwork Beef GUI for the selected item, allowing you to choose the exact artwork you want to add. This item is added to the 'Manage...' context menu. It also supports Artwork Downloader with a setting.

item.label: $ADDON[script.playrandomvideos 32100]
item.visible: Window.IsVisible(videos) + !Container.Content(movies) + !Container.Content(episodes) + !SubString(ListItem.FolderPath, plugin, Left) + !SubString(ListItem.FolderPath, addons, Left) + !SubString(ListItem.FolderPath, sources, Left)

extension.broken: Context menu has been merged into the script, a separate add-on is no longer needed.
extension.summary: Plays random videos from the selected list.
extension.description: Plays random videos from the selected list. It can play random episodes from TV shows, movies from genres/sets/years/tags, and videos from playlists, the filesystem, and just about anything else, other than plugins.

extension.summary: A little place for my stuff.
extension.description: I'm Rector, I do stuff, I put it here.

item.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(disablecontext:script.artwork.beef) + [StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, set) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, tvshow) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode)]

!Skin.HasSetting(disablecontext:script.artwork.beef) + [StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, set) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, tvshow) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode)]

extension.summary: Automatically adds extra artwork for your media.
extension.description: Artwork Beef automatically adds extra artwork for TV shows and movies into your library. It grabs them from wonderful web services and the file system.
extension.disclaimer: Artwork sources: fanart.tv, TheTVDB.com, The Movie Database
extension.news:
v0.10.2 (2017-07-25) - Feature: don't repeatedly request artwork from an unavailable web service - Fix: don't remove animated artwork set by other add-ons - Fix: always allow movie sets to be re-matched from TMDB
v0.10.1 (2017-05-12) - Really remove auto-generated thumbnails - Fix error when listing all seasons in Jarvis - Fix error with unicode characters from NFO file
v0.10.0 (2017-04-21) - Automatically find new artwork for old items only once per day - Plus option to disable automatic updates for old items altogether - Remove movie thumbnail Kodi automatically creates if your scraper is not configured to add a poster - Add manual action to remove all artwork of a specific type
v0.9.1 (2017-02-11) - Fix setting season artwork
v0.9.0 (2017-01-27) - Support movie set artwork - Merge context items into main add-on - [B]Upgrade action![/B] Uninstall context menu add-ons "Select artwork to add" and "Add missing artwork" - Rearrange libs, drop last dependency not available in official Kodi repo - [B]Upgrade action![/B] Uninstall add-on dependency "Development Helper" - Spread out checking for new artwork so they don't happen all at once (after the first run) - Fix error when displaying non-ASCII characters in GUI

extension.summary: Artwork Helper provides a couple of tools to skins and other add-ons for working with artwork.
extension.description: Artwork Helper provides a couple of tools to skins and other add-ons for working with artwork. See README.md for detailed usage.
extension.disclaimer: Artwork Helper does not directly add functionality on its own and must be supported by skins or other add-ons.

extension.description: Packed for KODI from https://github.com/ionrock/cachecontrol. [CR]Has a fix merged in.
extension.broken: No longer used nor supported for Kodi.

extension.description: Packed for KODI from http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/pylockfile. [CR]Recently deprecated, but does what it needs to for now.
extension.broken: No longer used nor supported for Kodi.

item.label: $ADDON[script.playrandomvideos 32100]
item.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(disablecontext:script.playrandomvideos) + [Window.IsVisible(videos) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, set) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, tvshow) | StringCompare(ListItem.DBTYPE, season)] + ListItem.IsFolder + !ListItem.IsParentFolder + !SubString(ListItem.FolderPath, plugin, Left) + !SubString(ListItem.FolderPath, addons, Left) + !SubString(ListItem.FolderPath, sources, Left) + !StringCompare(ListItem.FolderPath, add)

extension.summary: Plays random videos from all sorts of lists.
extension.description: This add-on can quickly play random episodes from TV shows, movies from genres/sets/years/tags, and videos from playlists, the filesystem, and just about anything else, other than plugins.

extension.summary: This service notifies you of stinger scenes in the currently playing movie.
extension.description: This add-on notifies you of stinger scenes in the current movie, popping up a notification when the credits roll. It uses tags to identify movies that have a stinger scene, which can be automatically added by the Universal Movie Scraper from The Movie Database. It can also query the ChapterDb to identify the end credits if the media file does not have its own chapters.
extension.disclaimer: This add-on requires the tags 'aftercreditsstinger' and/or 'duringcreditsstinger' on movies with a stinger scene.
extension.news: v1.0.3 (2017-04-14) - Work around Kodi bug introduced in Krypton when playing movie from Home window

extension.summary: This service tweaks when the last played time for videos is updated to be more useful.
extension.description: This add-on changes the last played time for videos to update only if at least a small portion has actually been played, hopefully improving the usefulness of lists and add-ons using this timestamp.
extension.news: v0.5.3 (2017-04-14) - Work around Kodi bug introduced in Krypton when playing movie from Home window
